1.text: Break the word down into 6 root words.
1.vid: /c/c6/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 1.360p.mp4

2.vid: /a/ad/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 2.360p.mp4

3.vid: /8/86/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 3.360p.mp4

4.vid: /7/7a/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 4.360p.mp4

5.vid: /c/cd/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 5.360p.mp4

6.vid: /f/fa/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 6.360p.mp4

7.vid: /2/27/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Put all of the roots together to say the word.
8.vid: /9/98/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Listen to other people pronouncing the word so you hear how it sounds.
9.vid: /7/76/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Clap with each syllable so you don’t miss any part of the word.
10.vid: /f/f1/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 10.360p.mp4

11.text: Try using the word in a sentence to practice reading and saying it.
11.vid: /8/85/Pronounce the Longest Word in the English Dictionary Step 11.360p.mp4
